sentence: The  tech  start-up  coach  has  spent  every  waking  moment  trying  to  find  out  the  whereabouts  of  several  family  members  who  disappeared  Saturday  after  Hamas  militants  stormed  into  their  towns  killing  civilians  and  taking  others  hostage.
The  strikes  have  killed  more  than  1,055  people,  among  them  some  500  women  and  children.
Entire  families  have  been  killed  and  there's  no  way  for  people  to  leave.
The  military  wing  of  Hamas  has  threatened  to  execute  a  hostage  for  every  bomb  that's  dropped  on  a  home  without  warning.
